metadata.description: In this official movie prequel, you'll witness the origins of the mysterious FALLEN. Follow MEGATRON's rise to power. Join OPTIMUS PRIME as he fights to prevent all-out war on his home world of Cybertron. In this thrilling volume, the foundation is forged for the TRANSFORMERS: REVENGE OF THE FALLEN movie extravaganza. This is the beginning of the war that will eventually rage across Earth's surface!
metadata.name: Transformers: Defiance - The Revenge of the Fallen Movie Prequel
